scripts.build:android: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform android --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.android.jsbundle --assets-dest dist/res
scripts.build:ios: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.build:macos: npm run mkdist && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform macos --dev true --bundle-output dist/main.macos.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p dist && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output dist/main.android.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.bundle:ios: mkdir -p dist && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output dist/main.ios.jsbundle --assets-dest dist
scripts.repod: rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && rm -rf ios/build && npx pod-install && xed ios
